schema:creator: Maes, Luca
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ I created this piece using acrylic paint on paper as a way to honor the countless doctors and nurses in this country and around the world who have been sacrificing so much including time with their families and their own health in order to save lives during this devastating pandemic.  
 __Participant age:__ 16  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Drawing or Painting
schema:name: Thank You, Health Care Workers
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
